title: Confessions of A Military Wife (gnv64)
description:
Confessions of A Military Wife (Updated, expanded)
by Mollie Gross
Savas Beatie | November 2015 | ISBN-10: 1611212502 | PDF | 288 pages | 19.7 mb

Confessions of a Military Wife is an honest, witty, and often hilarious look at the life of the new generation military wife. Mollie Gross learned the hard way to laugh instead of cry at what she could not control as a military spouse?and as she quickly discovered, nearly everything was out of her control!
A standup comedienne, public speaker, and wife of a Marine Corps officer, Mollie explores everything about the â€œissuedâ€ spouse, from deployment and the stress of having a husband in a combat zone, to the realization that marriage changes when your husband returns home from war. Nothing is taboo or out-of-bounds in Confessions, including the â€œpartiesâ€ military wives throw for themselves before hubby returns. (Youâ€™ll have to read the book to find out about those!)
Updated, expanded, and now in paperback, Confessions is a canâ€™t-put-down book that will leave you laughing and crying at the same time.

About the Author
Mollie Gross is a professional stand-up comedienne, motivational speaker, and the wife of a USMC Iraq War veteran. She teaches audiences to â€œHandle it with Humorâ€? to learn how to laugh through lifeâ€™s toughest challenges. To follow her on social media, listen to her podcast, or inquire about booking, please visit www.molliegross.com.
